skillTree.localised_description: Dark, feral beasts indigenous to Naggaroth, tempted from their damp, warm caves to bear the Druchii to battle.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

enabled_if: Unit has exceeded the murderous prowess value

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

skillTree.localised_description: Magnificent chariots, gifted to those who have impressed with their devotion, bravery and prowess in battle.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

skillTree.localised_description: This terrifying Black Dragon is the Witch King's favoured mount upon which to ride into battle.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can fly.

skillTree.localised_description: There is great pleasure to be derived from the humiliation and suffering of others; this one has felt and revelled in it.
The strength of this warrior's attack never wavers for an instance, such is the opprobrium felt for their hated High Elf cousins.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against High Elves

skillTree.localised_description: The Bloody-handed God watches over his disciples.
Magic's dark mistress has a care for her dutiful acolytes.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Experience gain: +20% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Experience gain: +35% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Experience gain: +50% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Oppression. Cruelty. Incontrovertible power.

effects.description:
Income from all buildings: +10%
	(all regions factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Unsurprisingly, dread, either of the lash or summary execution, is something of an incentive for many.
In society, one must learn to conform... or suffer the direst of consequences.
By carrot or stick, those whose lot it is to serve can always be made to work harder; usually by stick...

effects.description:
Construction time: -30% for all buildings
	(local province)

Construction cost: -10% for all buildings
	(local province)

Construction time: -60% for all buildings
	(local province)

Construction cost: -20% for all buildings
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: The war is endless, it will never cease. Stay ready.

effects.description:
Income from post-battle loot: +10%
	(all characters factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Every last ounce of wealth is there for the taking, should you know where to look. In that regard, this one knows exactly what he is doing.
They say for evil to triumph, all that's required is that the good do nothing… or, preferably, are stone dead from the outset.

effects.description:
[HIDDEN - do not translate] Used to increase lord rank when replacing a lord (target the effect at forces factionwide) - use in conjunction with a shown effect that targets provinces factionwide
	(own armies factionwide)

Attrition: -25% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

[HIDDEN - do not translate] Used to increase lord rank when replacing a lord (target the effect at forces factionwide) - use in conjunction with a shown effect that targets provinces factionwide
	(own armies factionwide)

Attrition: -50% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: When literally nothing is beyond your reach, there can be no sanctuary and no escape.
The tough, scaly hide of the Sea Dragon provides excellent protection against all manner of blows.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(all units in army)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Magic is a most useful tool on the field of battle, but generally secondary in the face of good, old-fashioned brute force.

skillTree.localised_description: The most effective raiders have a plan that is certain to succeed and stick to it; this one ensures that they do.

skillTree.localised_description: Judicious, or even not-so-judicious, use of the lash tends to get the desired results, so why hold back?

skillTree.localised_description: An elite even amongst elites, this accomplished warrior directs the cut-and-thrust of melee - a choreographer of death, you might say.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who fail to make the grade don't just die, they're tortured and used for target practice!

skillTree.localised_description: You'd think that pillaging the land would bring payment enough. You'd be wrong.

skillTree.localised_description: The gods help those who help themselves - raising them above the rank and file to elite status.

skillTree.localised_description: The murderous, unforgiving rage of Khaine can be transferred from a Lord to his legions.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
This one ensures that those captured in battle wished they'd died on the field, so great is the cruelty that awaits them.
"You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."
If there were annals detailing the dastardly deeds of the sackers and looters of the world, this inveterate brigand would feature heavily.
Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
Knowing precisely where and when to launch an ambush, and against who, takes an unusual level of guile.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: The ancient Asur arts teach one how to heal as well as how to harm.

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

factionEffects.localised_description: The Witch King is the supreme ruler of Naggaroth, and the eternal enemy of the High Elves. Long ago, he sought to claim Ulthuan's crown, but the Flames of Asuryan left him scarred by fire and twisted with hatred.

ui_effects.localised_text: Explosion does not affect friendly troops

effects.description: Allegiance points gained: +50% for alliances with Dark Elves
Glory to Malekith sacrifices and unique slave buildings
Upkeep: -10% for Black Guard of Naggarond, Dreadspears, Bleakswords and Darkshards units
Unique units: Manticore Lords, Shadowfire Guard and High Elves units after taking Shrine of Asuryan
Winds of Magic cost: -5 for "Power of Darkness"
Spell number of uses: +2 for "Power of Darkness"

items.colour_text: Malekith's rune-armour is forged from the hardest meteoric iron and protects against any mortal weapon.
